properties.description:
INPUT OBSERVABLES: DOMAIN OR URL
---
Use this response action to verify wether a domain or URL is reachable from your ThousandEyes agents (right now it works with *endpoint* agents, but can be easily adjusted for enterprise agents). It creates a instant test to check the reachability to verify your policy enforcement.

actions.name: Group
actions.title: Grab group ID of inputted group name

properties.description: Can be skipped if group ID is  known
properties.display_name: Grab group ID of inputted group name

actions.name: JSONPath Query
actions.title: Grab  Test ID from returned body

properties.display_name: Grab  Test ID from returned body

properties.description: did not eant to create infinite loop. check twice and if no results yet something went wrong.
Change webex to other medium if needed.

properties.name: thousandeyes_group_id
properties.description: stores the group_id of the group of agents you want to create tests from. used in workflow to create instant test to check reachability of domains.
